creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: stylized Native American standing with legs wide apart on a rounded green form; figure has pink face and wears orange pants and shirt with pink details, pink moccasins and black apron with pink X's; white dog with black ears and small black spot on back lying down in LLQ; black ground with vertical pink line left of center at top, red ring around bottom portion of green form and diagonal red line with irregular black line at center from LLC to previous red ring
marks: Signature, Edition and Stamp LRC, in pencil: [Scholder]
title: Indian at the Circus
